column1: Uchi////So we then place a first round order... which actually doesn't show up until the end of the meal because we had to remind them of the items
column2: which ended up being 3 hours later (they were still on the receipt though of course).  They comp one because "oops".  I order a glass of wine at one point earlier -- and I have to ask three different staff members for it over the course of 40 minutes -- before they bring out two within 2 minutes of one another.  They do not comp the F-up-wine.  Whatever
column3: I need a drink at this point.
